```{r echo=FALSE}
# invalid function
invalid <- function(x){
  if (missing(x) || is.null(x) || length(x) == 0 || is(x, "try-error")) {
    return(TRUE)
  }
  if (is.list(x)) {
    return(all(sapply(x, invalid)))
  }
  else if (is.vector(x)) {
    return(all(is.na(x)))
  }
  else {
    return(FALSE)
  }
}
```
